item.title: Preparation for the trip
item.description: Table of Contents Why you should prepare ? Mental & Emotional Preparation Why Self-Confidence is Critical? Preparation Physical Preparation Clothing Financial Planning Financial Planning Administration 1st way 2nd way Plane ticket Organisation TL;DR 🧭 1. Why You Must Prepare 🧠 2. Mental & Emotional Preparation ✅ 2.1. Build Self-Confidence 🌍 2.2. Expect Cultural Shock 🧩 2.3. Social Life: The Maze 🧱 2.4. Accept Responsibility 🛑 2.5. Be Wise and Cautious 🧕 2.6. Be Ready for Discrimination 🧭 2.7. Protect Your Values 💪 3. Physical Preparation 🏥 3.1. Health 🧣 3.2. Clothing 💰 4. Financial Planning 📦 4.1. Smart Spending 📱 4.2. Phone & SIM Card 🗃️ 5. Administrative Preparation 🗂️ 5.1. Documents 🚇 5.2. Transport Pass (Navigo Imagine R) ✈️ 6. Plane Ticket 🗓️ 7. Personal Organization Before arriving to France you need to prepare for your arrival, this will make your integration here easier. Getting ready mentally, physically, financially, and administratively is something you shouldn’t skip or ignore.
